eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST for the following areas: Alabama; Arkansas; Iowa; Illinois; Kansas; Louisiana; Minnesota; Missouri; Mississippi; North Dakota; Nebraska; Oklahoma; South Dakota; Tennessee; Texas; Wisconsin; at 10:00 AM ON DEC 8, 2025 Effective until 11:00 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
